purpose: To provide examples and demos of using Python AI Agent frameworks in conjunction with GitHub Models and Azure OpenAI.
principle: Utilizes Python-based AI frameworks to create agents that can interact with GitHub Models and Azure OpenAI services.
reusability: Examples can be reused or adapted for different AI agent applications, showcasing integration patterns with Azure services.
limitations: Examples are primarily for demonstration; may not cover all use cases or be production-ready.
name: python-ai-agent-frameworks-demos
description: A repository of examples using Python AI Agent frameworks that work with GitHub Models and Azure OpenAI.
highlight: Demonstrates integration of Python AI Agent frameworks with GitHub Models and Azure OpenAI for practical applications.
